text: usane tumhaare lie deen ka vahee raasta muqarrar kiya jis (par chalane ka) nooh ko hukm diya tha aur (ai rasool) usee kee hamane tumhaare paas vahee bhejee hai aur usee ka ibraaheem aur moosa aur eesa ko bhee hukm diya tha (vah) ye (hai ki) deen ko qaayam rakhana aur usamen tafaraqa na daalana jis deen kee taraph tum musharekeen ko bulaate ho vah un par bahut shaaq guzarata hai khuda jisako chaahata hai apanee baaragaah ka baraguzeeda kar leta hai aur jo usakee taraph roojoo kare (apanee taraf (pahunchane) ka raasta dikha deta hai
